title: Ambient Video Game Music - Lighthouse In a Storm
description: Embark on an auditory journey to a rugged coastline, where nature's most elemental forces come alive with our collection of 10 ambient tracks.
longDescription:
Embark on an auditory journey to a rugged coastline, where nature's most elemental forces come alive with our collection of 10 ambient tracks. From the very first note, listeners are enveloped in a world where fierce waves relentlessly crash against the jagged embrace of ancient rocks, where winds howl with wild abandon, carrying with them the delicate whispers of raindrops. Every sound, every nuance, paints a vivid picture of a lighthouse — that iconic beacon of hope and resilience — standing tall and unyielding amidst the storm's fury.


For game developers and content creators, this collection offers more than just background music. It's a ticket to transport your audience, to make them feel the spray of the ocean, the chill of the storm, and the warmth of a guiding light, all without leaving their seats. Perfectly suited for scenes demanding depth, emotion, and atmosphere, these tracks will not just enhance your project, but breathe life into it, creating an experience that remains long after the final note fades away.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqLP4P6jCY4

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IborGOUa7fg

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puCqQzlPtUw


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
